title: LG LSXS26366S 26 Cu. Ft. Side-by-Side Refrigerator with Smart Cooling Plus
description: The LG LSXS26366S 26 Cu. Ft. Side-by-Side Refrigerator with Smart Cooling Plus is designed to provide high performance and ample storage for your kitchen needs. This side-by-side refrigerator offers a total of 26 cubic feet of space for both fresh and frozen foods. It features LG’s Smart Cooling Plus™ technology, which uses advanced cooling systems to maintain optimal temperature and humidity levels. The refrigerator comes with a built-in ice and water dispenser for convenience and has adjustable shelves and door bins for customizable storage. The modern stainless steel design, combined with LED lighting and a water filter, makes the LSXS26366S a great choice for those seeking a stylish and efficient refrigerator.
meta_title: LG LSXS26366S 26 Cu. Ft. Side-by-Side Refrigerator with Smart Cooling Plus
meta_description: Shop the LG LSXS26366S 26 Cu. Ft. Side-by-Side Refrigerator with Smart Cooling Plus. Features built-in ice and water dispenser, adjustable shelves, stainless steel finish, and LED lighting.

title: LG LSXS26366S 26 Cu. Ft. Side-by-Side Refrigerator with Ice Maker and Water Dispenser
description: The LG LSXS26366S 26 Cu. Ft. Side-by-Side Refrigerator with Ice Maker and Water Dispenser offers a spacious and modern solution for your food storage needs. Featuring a 26 cubic feet capacity, this refrigerator provides generous storage space for all your groceries. It includes LG’s Smart Cooling Plus™ technology to keep your food fresh with optimal temperature and humidity control. The built-in ice maker and water dispenser offer easy access to cold drinks and ice. With adjustable shelves and door bins, this refrigerator allows for flexible storage options. The sleek stainless steel design, along with LED lighting and a water filter, adds a touch of elegance to any kitchen.
meta_title: LG LSXS26366S 26 Cu. Ft. Side-by-Side Refrigerator with Ice Maker and Water Dispenser
meta_description: Buy the LG LSXS26366S 26 Cu. Ft. Side-by-Side Refrigerator with Ice Maker and Water Dispenser. Features Smart Cooling Plus™, adjustable shelves, stainless steel design, and LED lighting.
